name: Trine 2: Complete Story
description: Three Heroes make their way through dangers untold in a fairytale world, featuring physics-based puzzles, beautiful sights and online co-op.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 7 / Vista / XP Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU (Dual Core recommended)  Memory: 1 GB Hard Disk Space: 4.5 GB  Video Card: ATi Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or better (Shader Model 3.0 needs to be supported) DirectXÂ®: 9.0c Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible  Additional: *Please note that Trine 2 may not run on most Intel graphics solutions used in 2004-2009. The game does run on new (2010-) Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better.
